posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jay
The following are for sale or trade (preferred). These are the actual Sporting News supplements, not the more common National Copperplate images which could be ordered as a set. These could only be acquired one at a time with the publication. Most have pin holes in the corners and other minor imperfections. All are rare. Scans are available at oldjudge@gmail.com

Sept. 23, 1899-------------Frank Donahue(Pitcher, Philadelphia)-----$300
Sept. 30, 1899-------------Ed Delahanty*(Captain and Left Fielder,  
                               Philadelphis)------------------------$2500
Nov. 4, 1899---------------Lave Cross*(Third Baseman, St Louis)------$750
May 12, 1900---------------William Dinnean(Pitcher,Boston)----------$300
May 19, 1900---------------James Williams(Third Baseman, Pittsburg)-$300
June 2, 1900---------------John (Buckey) Freeman(Outfielder,Boston)-$400
June 9, 1900---------------Henry Peitz(Catcher, Cincinnati)---------$300
June 23, 1900--------------Frank Hahn(Pitcher, Cincinnati)----------$300
July 14, 1900--------------John D. Chesbro(Pitcher, Pittsburg)------$2000
Sept. 8, 1900--------------Theodore Breitenstein(Pitcher,Cincinnati)-$300
Sept. 15, 1900-------------Herman Long*(Shortstop, Boston)-----------$450
Oct. 20, 1900--------------Roy Thomas(Center Fielder,Philadelphia)--$250

*--In Old Judge Set

Thanks---Jay
